mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Hot Line- Late News", "A Square Dance Program for All", "Questions and Answers", "1973 Directory of Youth Groups", "A History of Square Dancing", "Smoother Dancing Poster", "Take a Good Look - Spin Back and Fan Back", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Square Dance Diary", "Callers Textbook - Chapter Twenty-Nine", "Ladies on the Square", "Round Dance Module", "Paging the Round Dancers: Bob and Lynn Long", "Style Lab - One Couple Drills", "National Square Dance Convention", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Callers/Teachers Workshop", "Caller of the Month: Lloyd Priest", "On the Record: Reviews", "Square Dance Date Book", and "Fashion Feature".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
